#summary How to start more than 2900 Nodes per vm.

= Introduction =

To start more than 2900 Nodes per VM, you have to edit the boot.sh script.


== Details ==

Change this:

{{{
erl $ERL_OPTS -setcookie "chocolate chip cookie" -pa ../contrib/log4erl/ebin -pa ../contrib/yaws/ebin -pa ../ebin -yaws embedded true -connect_all false -sname boot@localhost -s boot
}}}

to

{{{
erl $ERL_OPTS +P 1000000 -env ERL_MAX_ETS_TABLES 20000 -setcookie "chocolate chip cookie" -pa ../contrib/log4erl/ebin -pa ../contrib/yaws/ebin -pa ../ebin -yaws embedded true -connect_all false -sname boot@localhost -s boot
}}}

== Hint ==

To start 6000 Nodes you need at least 3GB of memory for erlang and up to 8 Cores.
All tests done with Erlang/OTP R13B!!!
